snippet: The morning attacks in the Sheikh Radwan neighborhood are the latest in a series attributed to extremists aligned with the Islamic State group.
abstract: Series of explosions destroy several vehicles belonging to Hamas and Islamic Jihad officials, injuring at least two people in nearby homes; attacks are only latest in Gaza to be attributed to extremists who have aligned themselves with Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: The morning attacks in the Sheikh Radwan neighborhood are the latest in a series attributed to extremists aligned with the Islamic State group.

headline.main: Explosions in Gaza Destroy Vehicles of Hamas and Islamic Jihad Officials
headline.print_headline: Gaza Blasts Destroy Hamas and Islamic Jihad Vehicles

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
